title: Episode #1.1
description: District Nurse Megan gets a call to a small South Wales town in the mid 1920's, to investigate a virulent epidemic.

title: Episode #1.2
description: District Nurse Megan is convinced that an epidemic is caused by something nasty in the water supply, and is determined to find out what.

title: Episode #1.3
description: District Nurse Megan helps a local farmer's cow give birth. She slowly gets accepted into the village.

title: Episode #1.4
description: District Nurse Megan discovers that the local children have contracted horrible head lice.

title: Episode #1.5
description: Poor District Nurse Megan gets attacked in the street by the parents of nit-infested kids, and tends a local who is sick with pneumonia

title: Episode #1.6
description: District Nurse Megan has to deal with a complicated pregnancy in a remote cottage...all alone.

title: Episode #1.7
description: District Nurse Megan is convinced two of her patients are lying about their injuries, and Megan has a strange and worrying conversation with young Nora.

title: Episode #1.8
description: District Nurse Megan finds that proving why young Nora mysteriously died is near impossible.

title: Episode #1.9
description: District Nurse Megan travels up to North Wales to visit lovely Mrs. Pughe-Morgan.

title: Episode #1.10
description: District Nurse Megan moves into Gwen and David's cottage, causing nasty tongues to start wagging. Megan decides to join the local brass band.

title: Episode #1.11
description: Gwen gets threatened with eviction unless District Nurse Megan moves out of the cottage. The school outing to the seaside ends in a disastrous encounter with some sheep.

title: Episode #1.12
description: District Nurse Megan has her hands full dealing with the aftermath of the School kids bus crash.
